main.title: ASSI Tech
main.span: Our company ASSITECHBIO specializes in: sales and service of ultrasound devices and organization of ultrasound courses.
main.span1: We offer a wide range of equipment from various manufacturers and price categories: from compact portable ultrasound machines for mobile services to high-precision stationary installations for medical institutions.
main.text1: We work with trusted suppliers and guarantee product quality, as well as provide warranty and post-warranty service for ultrasonic devices.
main.text2: Our specialists have extensive experience in the field of medical equipment and are always ready to help with the selection and installation of the necessary equipment
main.text3: Our goal is to provide customers with the best ultrasound machines, help them optimize their work and improve the efficiency of diagnosing and treating patients.
main.text4: We strive for long-term relationships with our customers, offering them only the best equipment and service.

services.title: Courses we offer
services.text1: Adult neurosonography, pediatric echocardiography, obstetrics and gynecology, fetal echocardiography
